column12: None for open files; restricted return 403
column15: Only dedicated qualitative data repository; confirmed QDPX files
Formerly Scholars Portal; confirmed NVivo codebook files

column4: AUSSDA — The Austrian Social Science Data Archive
column15: Skipped — all datasets use AUSSDA Scientific Use Licence; 0 downloads across all queries
Hosts files from Dutch universities; actual file downloads (unlike ODISSEI portal)
French social science; most files restricted

column4: ODISSEI Portal — Open Data Infrastructure for Social Science
column15: Metadata-only portal; files array always empty; datasets discoverable via DANS and DataverseNL
Skipped — all datasets use ČSDA restricted licence; 0 downloads across all queries

column4: Recherche Data Gouv — French National Research Data Repository
column15: French national repository; standard MD5 checksums

column4: Abacus Data Network (University of British Columbia)
column15: Separate from Borealis; small qualitative yield
Confirmed focus group transcripts and interview data

column4: LiDA — Lithuanian Data Archive for SSH

Skipped — all datasets use ISSDA End User Licence; 0 downloads across all queries

column4: CORA — Research Data Repository of Catalonia
column15: Good qualitative yield; some datasets have Local Contexts notices

column4: UCLA Social Science Data Archive Dataverse
column15: Low qualitative-specific yield; better results with broader queries
Education and social science
Includes interview transcripts; German-language metadata

column4: NIE Data Repository — National Institute of Education
column15: Education research focus
POST search + GET metadata; skips figures/media/code/posters/presentations; S3 redirect downloads
JSON:API format; skips registrations/preprints/forks/collections; 1s throttle (100 req/hr limit); SHA-256 checksums; contributors via embedded users endpoint

column12: None for 160+ datasets; registration for others
column15: OAI-PMH ListRecords with Dublin Core for search (local keyword matching); DDI 2.5 GetRecord for rich metadata; access level from restrctn field; resumptionToken pagination
Advanced Search API with Lucene queries; metadata API per item; original files only (skip derivatives); MD5 checksums; 1s throttle with 429 backoff

column4: Library of Congress — Digital Collections (Oral Histories)
column15: JSON API with fo=json; 3.5s throttle (20 req/min limit; 1-hour IP block on exceed); resource shortcuts (pdf/audio/video/fulltext); filters for digitized items only
Skipped — all datasets lack license field; 0 downloads possible
Zero new code; downloads working; CC BY items found; Spanish-language metadata
Skipped — file download API returns HTTP 500; server-side instability
Skipped — most datasets use proprietary IIL-1.0 license or have no files
Zero new code; requires browser-style User-Agent (WAF); 22 files downloaded in 3-item test; much better with Portuguese queries
Skipped — metadata-only portal; no files downloadable

column4: Qualiservice — Research Data Center for Qualitative Social Science Data
column15: Skipped — formal contract required

column4: QualiBi — Qualitative Data in Educational Research
column15: No public portal; records on GUDE with all rights reserved
